data.description: At Nespresso, we place people and specialty coffee at the heart of what we do. As part of our team, you'll be empowered to inspire, care, act, and innovate to reach your full potential and reimagine what coffee can be. As a certified B Corporation, we're committed to driving our triple bottom line – People, Profit, and Planet – by delivering an exceptional coffee experience that elevates our community, suppliers, farmers, and each other, channeling our growth-minded spirit to set new standards in global coffee culture. Quality, sustainability, diversity, and inclusion are core to who we are and critical to our vision of driving positive change. Throughout our factories, boutiques, and office locations, Nespresso careers are brimming with best-in-class opportunities for your development and growth. Join us! We are currently hiring an intern to join our Business Analytics Team for the Summer of 2026. This will be a 10-week internship which will begin on June 8th and end on August 14th. This role is office based at our Nespresso Square office located in Midtown Manhattan, New York City. While there may be some flexibility to work remotely, all candidates must be able to commute to the office as needed. Responsibilities: Our intern will support the Core Analytics team by enhancing reporting capabilities, automating manual processes, and generating actionable insights from sales data. The project will focus on Improving data democratization and visualization for key stakeholders across Commercial/Business Development teams. Streamline existing reporting processes to reduce manual effort. Advance data democratization by centralizing analytics efforts and standardizing data definitions. Support ad hoc analysis requests to inform strategic decisions. Mid Point Goals: Conduct an audit of existing data sources and reporting tools to identify inconsistencies and gaps. Begin development and deployment of a centralized data dictionary for commonly used sales metrics and terminology. Launch initial version of a shared analytics repository with defined access protocols Final Deliverables: Completed and validated data dictionary covering key sales analytics terms and metrics. Operational shared analytics repository with documentation and user access. Presentation to Sales and Analytics leadership outlining implemented solutions and roadmap for continued data democratization. Requirements: Candidates must be currently enrolled in a 4-year college. The approximate target compensation range for this role is $25-$30/hr . Please note that the pay range provided is a good faith estimate for the position at the time of posting. Final compensation may vary based on factors including but not limited to background, knowledge, skills, and abilities as well as geographic location of the position. It is our business imperative to remain a very inclusive workplace. To our veterans and separated service members, you're at the forefront of our minds as we recruit top talent to join Nestlé. The skills you've gained while serving our country, such as flexibility, agility, and leadership, are much like the skills that will make you successful in this role. In addition, with our commitment to an inclusive work environment, we recognize the exceptional engagement and innovation displayed by individuals with disabilities. Nestlé seeks such skilled and qualified individuals to share our mission where you’ll join a cohort of others who have chosen to call Nestlé home. Nestlé Nespresso USA is an equal employment opportunity employer. All applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or veteran status or any other characteristic protected by applicable law. Prior to the next step in the recruiting process, we welcome you to inform us confidentially if you may require any special accommodations in order to participate fully in our recruitment experience. Contact us at accommodations@nestle.com or please dial 711 and provide this number to the operator: 1-800-321-6467. This position is not eligible for Visa Sponsorship. Review our applicant privacy notice before applying at https://www.nestlejobs.com/privacy. Job Requisition: 375894
